channel.title: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~
channel.description:
ok Several people have asked me how to unset recovery questions, and now i have spare time so i will post it up at Warriors-Elite, TTG, Hostile, liqduid rune and Moparisthebest to make life easier for people.
[SIZE=4]::::...How To Unset Recovery Questions, By Kingikz...:::[/SIZE]
1) Go to [URL=http://www.runescape.com]http://www.runescape.com[/URL]
2) Find This Following Section on the Main Mage And click where it says ''Click here'' in image [IMG]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/4152/recovs1yt7.jpg[/img]
3) Once You Click on there fill in details asked and for query type select ''Someone else knows my recovery questions'' Like shown below in image: [IMG]http://img113.imageshack.us/img113/4286/recovs2kr6.jpg[/img]
4) Once you have done that click submit and it should come to another screen and fill AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE.
5) Click Submit Details Then Continue
6) Note Down the I.D Given to you and click continue like shown in the image below: [IMG]http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/2894/recovs3ib4.jpg[/img]
7) Now Enter The I.d you just noted down in the next part and click continue
8) Now you need to keep the i.d safe so you can track it, tracking means to find out if jagex have accepted, declined or the application is still pending. To Track your i.d you will need to go to the following place: [IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/7788/recovs4os8.jpg[/img]
[b] Notes [/b][LIST] [*]There is a chance of your account getting locked if done wrong [*]Do this only if you are selling your account or someone else knows your recovery answers [*]You Need To fill in as much details as possible if you want jagex to accept [/LIST] ~Kingikz~

item.title: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~
item.dc:creator: @kingikz kingikz
item.description:
@kingikz wrote:

If you were recovering a lost password becuase you had forgotten your password, or someone else changed it then you will be rite, but in this case it does not do it automatically as it is unsetting recovery questions and even though you give every answer correct Jagex will still need to recieve the form rather than doing it automatically.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 11:39:19 AM[/size][hr]…

Read full topic
item.source: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~

item.title: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

In step 6, if you filled in the form pretty dam close or exactly to the answers you set, instead of the server forwarding your appeal to a customer support member, it would just accept it straight away.

Read full topic
item.source: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~

item.title: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~
item.dc:creator: @kingikz kingikz
item.description:
@kingikz wrote:

ok Several people have asked me how to unset recovery questions, and now i have spare time so i will post it up at Warriors-Elite, TTG, Hostile, liqduid rune and Moparisthebest to make life easier for people.

      [SIZE=4]::::...How To Unset Recovery Questions, By Kingikz...:::[/SIZE]

  1. Go to http://www.runescape.com

  2. Find This Following Section on the Main Mage And click where it says ‘‘Click here’’ in image

  3. Once You Click on there fill in details asked and for query type select ‘‘Someone else knows my recovery questions’’ Like shown below in image:

  4. Once you have done that click submit and it should come to another screen and fill AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE.

  5. Click Submit Details Then Continue

  6. Note Down the I.D Given to you and click continue like shown in the image below:

  7. Now Enter The I.d you just noted down in the next part and click continue

  8. Now you need to keep the i.d safe so you can track it, tracking means to find out if jagex have accepted, declined or the application is still pending. To Track your i.d you will need to go to the following place:

Notes [LIST]
[]There is a chance of your account getting locked if done wrong
[]Do this only if you are selling your account or someone else knows your recovery answers
[*]You Need To fill in as much details as possible if you want jagex to accept
[/LIST] ~Kingikz~

item.source: ~How To Unset Recovery Questions In Runescape~
